title: Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information                   Plan Your Visit               Operating Hours & Seasons               Guided Tours               History & Culture               Plan a Field Trip         Â     Welcome to Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site We preserve the legacy of the 1957 desegregation crisis and its role in the Civil Rights Movement. Please take time to explore the pages listed below to find information for planning a visit.
